topic.title: EMS Patient Care Narrative Section - conformance rules

section.p: A narrative description of the EMS encounter

ol.li:
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] templateId ( CONF:11405 ) such that it
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @root="2.16.840.1.113883.17.3.10.1.1"
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code (CONF:10551)/@code="67781-5" Summarization of Encounter Note Narrative (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC) (CONF:10552)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] title which SHOULD equal "EMS Patient Care Report Narrative" (CONF:10554)

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] text (CONF:10553)
NEMSIS Trace: ENarrative.01
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code (CONF:10551)/@code="67781-5" Summarization of Encounter Note Narrative (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC) (CONF:10552)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] title which SHOULD equal "EMS Patient Care Report Narrative" (CONF:10554)

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] text (CONF:10553)
NEMSIS Trace: ENarrative.01

body.codeblock: <section> <templateId root="2.16.840.1.113883.17.3.10.1.1"/> <code code="67781-5" codeSystem="2.16.840.1.113883.6.1" displayName="Summarization of Encounter Note Narrative"/> <title>EMS Patient Care Report Narrative</title> <text/> </section>
